Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student's data imported from an XLSX file.

mainItem.description: The main identifying information for the student, typically their full name.

subItems.description: An array of key-value pairs representing other information from the spreadsheet.

definition.description: Stores student data uploaded by a specific user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: studentId
params.description: The unique identifier of the student.
